title: Cognitive Science and Mysticism w/ Zevi Slavin, round 4- Voices with Vervaeke
description:
In this concluding episode of the series Zevi and I explore the prescriptive argument for Higher States of Consciousness and related mystical transformation. With Zevi's critical help I advance an argument to show how and why it is rationally  justifiable for people to seek out these states and be seekers of unity. 

Here is Zevi's channel Seekers of Unity:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL9A83sJIYNAovCA92uaTRQ

Here is round one of the series: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vN0TYleG14&t=908s

Here is round two:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-x4LFV_PfU&t=218s

Here is round three:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kx63NiNsB_0&t=955s

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis. You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
